abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.78.0 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: 1.78.1
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.78.0 release.

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Make sure part and set titleabbrev are used in mode="titleabbrev.markup"
Add empty default template for titleabbrev since it is always processed in a mode.
Make consistent handling of titleabbrev in xrefs.
for missing title in xref, provide parent information of target to help locate problem element. Process bridgehead in mode="title.markup", not normal mode.
Fixed bug #3598963
Make sure bridgeheads are not numbered in all contexts, including html title attributes.

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Fix bug where part TOC not generated when partintro is present.
Footnotes can't be placed into fo:float
Remove margin-left when start-indent is used because they interfere with each other.
Use dingbat.fontset rather than dingbat.font.family so it falls back to symbol font if glyph not found, like other font properties.
Change last instance of inline.charseq in inline glossterm to inline.italicseq so it is consistent with the others.
Make consistent handling of titleabbrev in xrefs.

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Turn off $admon.style if $make.clean.html is set to non-zero.
Added new definitions for syntax highlighting
Make active.olink.hrefs param work for chunked output too.
Make consistent handling of titleabbrev in xrefs.
Add round() function when pixel counts are used for image width and height.
fix missing class and id attributes on glossterm and glossdef.
Fix bug where prefer.index.titleabbrev ignored info/titleabbrev.

sect2.title: Manpages
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the manpages code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Fix bug 3599520: spurious newline in para when starts with whitespace and inline element.

sect2.title: Webhelp
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the webhelp code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Webhelp: Fix test for webhelp.include.search.tab param
Webhelp: Fix order of args to xsltproc
Webhelp: Turn on xinclude-test.xml in readme to demo xinclude functionality
Webhelp: In Makefiles, do xinclude in first pass at document

sect2.title: Params
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the params code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Webhelp: Fix test for webhelp.include.search.tab param
Remove unneeded margin-left property from article appendix title. It interferes with the start-indent property.

sect2.title: Highlighting
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the highlighting code since the 1.78.0 release.
